agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Elections TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, May 6, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Stephanie Klick SB 751 Hughes | et al. Relating to the creation of a criminal offense for fabricating a deceptive video with intent to influence the outcome of an election. SB 902 Hughes | et al. Relating to public availability of election records; authorizing a fee. SB 966 Bettencourt | et al. Relating to the location of certain temporary branch early voting polling places. SB 1568 Fallon | et al. Relating to organized election fraud activity; imposing a civil penalty. SB 1638 Zaffirini Relating to early voting procedures. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
